default.label: Label
default.options.0.label: Question 1
default.options.0.options.0.label: Answer 1
default.options.0.options.1.label: Answer 2
default.options.1.label: Question 2
default.options.1.options.0.label: Answer 1
default.options.1.options.1.label: Answer 2
description:
Quiz component that count only first answered values.

Return key value object with any type of data as value.
properties.disabled.description: This property prevents clicking the question. If the value is "true", all buttons in question is not active (the user will not be able to click it).
properties.options.items.properties.labe: A title of answer. Supports markdown
properties.options.items.properties.opti: Text that appears when answer checked. Supports markdown
